sentences.en: And Han Solo had such a cool charisma about him.
sentences.cn: 汉索罗的身上有一种很酷的气质.

sentences.en: Each pattern of limited production, allows you to experience a unique charisma.
sentences.cn: 每款图案的限量生产, 让您领略了独特的风采.

sentences.en: Empathy > 1 point bonus to your Charisma attribute per skill level.
sentences.cn: 怜悯》每技能等级增加1点魅力属性加成.

sentences.en: Even the president's undoubted charisma has not rendered him immune.
sentences.cn: 甚至HugoChávez总统 不容置疑的个人魅力亦无法使他豁免.

sentences.en: He has enormous charisma. He is a giant of a man.
sentences.cn: 他有超凡的个人魅力，是个伟人。

sentences.en: He has neither the policies nor the personal charisma to inspire people.
sentences.cn: 他既无谋略又无个人魅力来鼓舞人。

sentences.en: He is a great coach. He has charisma, personality, a winning mentality.
sentences.cn: 他是一名伟大的教练, 他有魅力, 有个性, 以及强烈的求胜欲望.

sentences.en: He was elected to power on the strength of his charisma.
sentences.cn: 他凭借其个人魅力而当选掌权。

sentences.en: He's a great teacher. He has a lot of energy and charisma.
sentences.cn: 他是个很棒的老师. 他精力充沛,很有感召力.

sentences.en: Onscreen, she lacks the vitality or charisma to pass this performance off.
sentences.cn: 电影中的她缺乏演绎这出戏的活力和魅力。

sentences.en: She has an extra charisma , or whatever you like to call it.
sentences.cn: 她极具魅力, 或是你想怎么赞美都不为过.

sentences.en: The charisma of a lane is its unequaled ease.
sentences.cn: 小巷的动人之处就是它无比的悠闲.

sentences.en: The President has great personal charisma.
sentences.cn: 总统具有超凡的个人魅力。

sentences.en: What are you going to bring to the table other than your charisma?
sentences.cn: 除了你的超凡魅力还带给我什么?

sentences.en: When she is on stage performing or dancing, she shows great charisma.
sentences.cn: 在台上表演、跳舞的她也非常有魅力.

trans.tran_cn: 魅力，<宗>神授的力量或才能，超凡的个人魅力，感召力
